MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 03-NOV-2020 12:11.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the G73 postcode area of Rutherglen affecting properties in Millar Terrace and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.04am. Our engineers have arrived on site at Cambuslang Road substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.35am on Tuesday 3rd November 2020.
